A name that uniquely identifies the given job
Path to the capture directory on which the given job has been applied
The order of the markov model that describes the workload associated with the current job. If NULL, the corresponding order has not been calculated yet.

A number in the range [0, 1] that represents the threshold that the user has given as an input parameter to the current job of Workload Intelligence for the identification of significant patterns. If NULL, the process of pattern identification has not been initiated yet.
